##########################################

my $initialFileList = toolbox::readDir($initialDir);

my $previousDir = $initialDir."/0_initialFiles";

foreach my $currentFile (@$initialFileList)
{
  my ($basicName) = toolbox::extractPath($currentFile);
  next if ($basicName =~ m/individuSoft|log\.[e|o]|Global_log$/); # Passing the individuSoft file

#Switch and populating variable

#Standard variables

my ($softParameters, $newDir,$stepOrder,$stepName,$fileWithoutExtention,$fastqForward,$fastqReverse,$samFile,$extension,$samFileOut,$shortDirName,$stepF1,

#Variable variables
my ($fastq1,$fastq2,$sam,$bam,$vcf);

my $globalAnalysis=0; #to check if all data are to be treated one by one  (0) or in group (1)

switch (1)
{
  case (scalar @$fileList == 2 && $$fileList[0] =~ m/fastq|fq$/ && $$fileList[1] =~ m/fastq|fq$/) {$fastq1=$$fileList[0];$fastq2=$$fileList[1]; print "\nPaired fastq files"} #Two paired fastq files
    case (scalar @$fileList == 2 && $$fileList[0] =~ m/fastq\.gz|fq\.gz$/ && $$fileList[1] =~ m/fastq\.gz|fq\.gz$/) {$fastq1=$$fileList[0];$fastq2=$$fileList[1]; print "\nPaired fastq.gz files"} #Two paired fastq files
  case (scalar @$fileList == 1 && $$fileList[0] =~ m/fastq|fq$/) {$fastq1=$$fileList[0]; print "\nSingle fastq file"} # Single fastq file
  case (scalar @$fileList == 1 && $$fileList[0] =~ m/fastq\.gz|fq\.gz$/) {$fastq1=$$fileList[0]; print "\nSingle fastq.gz file"} # Single fastq file
  case (scalar @$fileList == 1 && $$fileList[0] =~ m/sam$/) {$sam=$$fileList[0]; print "\nSingle SAM file"} # single SAM file
  case (scalar @$fileList == 1 && $$fileList[0] =~ m/bam$/) {$bam = $$fileList[0]; print "\nSingle BAM file"} # single BAM file
  case (scalar @$fileList == 1 && $$fileList[0] =~ m/vcf$/) {$vcf = $$fileList[0]; print "\nSingle VCF file"} #single VCF file
  case (scalar @$fileList == 1 && $$fileList[0] =~ m/vcf\.gz$/) {$vcf = $$fileList[0]; print "\nSingle VCF.gz file"} #single VCF file
  case (scalar @$fileList >= 2 && $$fileList[0] =~ m/sam|bam|vcf|bai|vcf\.gz$/) {$globalAnalysis =1;print "Multiple files, steps higher than 1000"} #multiple file for the case of step higher than 1000
  else { toolbox::exportLog("ERROR: The input files are not in a format usable by TOGGLE",0); } # Not the good formats
  
}


my @dirList; #List that will contain in order the different step directories
foreach my $position (sort {$a <=>$b} keys %{$hashOrder})
{
  if ($globalAnalysis == 0)
  {
    last if ($position >= 1000);
    my $directory = $initialDir."/".$position."_".$$hashOrder{$position};
    $directory =~ s/ //g; #Removing the spaces
    toolbox::makeDir($directory); # Create the folder associated with each steps
    push (@dirList,$directory); # Adding the newly created folder to the list of folders
  }
  else
  {
    next if ($position < 1000);
    my $directory = $initialDir."/".$position."_".$$hashOrder{$position};
    $directory =~ s/ /_/g; #Removing the spaces
    toolbox::makeDir($directory); # Create the folder associated with each steps
    push (@dirList,$directory); # Adding the newly created folder to the list of folders
  }
}
